item.title: Setting a column based on another one and multiple conditions in pandas
item.description: This notebook shows a way to set the value of one column in a CSV file, that satisfies multiple conditions, by extracting information from another column using the pandas library and the standard library re module.

item.title: Runtime comparison of pandas crosstab, groupby and pivot_table
item.description: In this notebook we'll compare the runtime of three different ways to group and summarize data using the pandas crosstab, groupby and pivot_table functions.

item.title: Word Cloud From Reddit Comments Gilded 10 Or More Times
item.description: In this notebook we create a word cloud from reddit comments that were gilded 10 or more times from the start of reddit to February 2019.

item.title: Stack Overflow Survey 2018: Respondents World Map
item.description: In this notebook I create a choropleth map that shows how many people responded to the Stack Overflow Developer Survey 2018 in relation to their countries' populations.

item.title: Stack Overflow Survey 2018: Technology Preferences
item.description: This notebook looks at technologies, that respondents of the Stack Overflow Survey 2018 worked with in the past, want to work with in the future, where these overlap and where not.

item.title: Creating a world map of metal bands in Python
item.description: This Jupyter notebook shows how to create a map of metal bands focusing on the issues that came up during the process and how they were solved.

item.title: Creating a Choropleth Map of the World in Python using GeoPandas
item.description: This Jupyter notebook walks through the process of creating a choropleth map of the world in Python using the GeoPandas package.

item.title: What Software Engineers Earn Compared to the General Population
item.description: In this notebook we'll compare the median annual income of software engineers to the average annual income (GDP per Capita) in 50 countries.

item.title: Word Cloud of the Most Frequent Words in the Canon of Sherlock Holmes
item.description: In this notebook I show how to create a shaped word cloud based on word frequencies in the canon of Sherlock Holmes by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle.

item.title: The Best Times to Post to reddit Revisited
item.description: In this notebook we revisit previous analyses of the best times to post to reddit by looking at several individual subreddits.
